name: Nomad
description: You grew up in the wilds, far from civilization and the comforts of town and technology. You’ve witnessed the migration of herds larger than forests, survived weather more extreme than any city-dweller could comprehend, and enjoyed the solitude of being the only thinking creature for miles in any direction. The wilds are in your blood, whether you were a nomad, an explorer, a recluse, a hunter-gatherer, or even a marauder. Even in places where you don’t know the specific features of the terrain, you know the ways of the wild.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Animal Handling, Athletics, Medicine, and Survival
equipmentMarkdown: A walking stick, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of traveler’s clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr
featureMarkdown: You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you. In addition, you can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five other people each day, provided that the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Often considered rude and uncouth among civilized folk, nomads have little respect for the niceties of life in the cities. The ties of tribe, clan, family, and the natural world are the most important bonds to nomads.

name: Scientist
description: Nothing excites you more than pushing the boundaries of scientific knowledge. Most of your time is spent in a lab performing experiments to further your interests. Few people understand the work you do. You can solve complex problems most people can't begin to wrap their heads around, and can solve simple problems in unexpected ways that surprise most people. \n\nWhat is your scientific field of interest? Is it your insatiable curiousity, or a personal goal that drives you? Did you leave your lab voluntarily, or were you kicked out? One thing is for sure - there are too many interesting research ideas, and too little time.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Lore, Medicine, Nature, and Technology
equipmentMarkdown: A set of common clothes, a datapad, a book on your field of research, a pouch containing 100 cr
specialityMarkdown: While scientist's are widely knowledgeable, they also choose a focus for their studies. Choose an option or roll on the table below to define your field of research.
featureMarkdown: You are well acquainted with your field of research from having read numerous journals or having attended scientific conferences. Concepts that are complicated, involving technical jargon that usually goes over most people's heads, are simple to you. You fully understand concepts, can recall key information, and know how to use equipment related to your field, unless the research was hidden from the public, in which you may only partially understand. You also recognize well-known figures in your field.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Scientist are interested in things most don't care about. Their research is their life, and drives their persornality traits. Their flaws, ideals, and bond are a result of their hours spent researching.

name: Lawyer
description:
Your duty is to uphold the law. Before becoming an adventurer you resided over a court or tribunal, managing proceedings and sentencing criminals to punishments fit for their crimes. Your job required a deep understanding of the law which you used to resolve conflicts both clear-cut and morally grey.

The legal system on the planet where you worked has a large effect on how you view the law. Was it a court system with a jury making the final verdict, or did you have absolute authority over determining guilt and sentencing? Was it a fair legal system with plenty of integrity, or was it rife with abuse and corruption? Did you work on criminal cases, civil law, or something even more specific? Perhaps instead of working for a government you were a judge in an internal tribunal for a temple or military organization.

Consider what compelled you to leave your old occupation behind and begin adventuring. Perhaps you seek to bring someone beyond the scope of law to justice, or maybe you have lost faith in the legal system altogether and have turned to a vigilante approach.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Insight, Investigation, Performance, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: Documentation of your station, a book of law, a formal uniform you wear to court, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr.
featureMarkdown: You are familiar with the letter of the law and workings of courts, at least on the planet that you were a judge in. If you are in a foreign place where you are not familiar with their exact laws, you often will be able to track down the resources you need to learn them. \n\nIf you or your party gets into legal trouble, your experience may help you get out of it. If you can prove your credentials, you might be able to represent your party in a court of law without admonishment. You may know of legal loopholes that will help your case. If you are in the region where you originally worked, you might have past connections with many legal professionals there.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: A lawyer's career is centered on issues of right, wrong, and punishment, so they will approach adventuring through a similar lens. They are used to being respected and in control, leading many of them to struggle with wild, Any situations.

name: Scoundrel
description: You have always had a way with people. You can tease out their heart’s desires after a few minutes of conversation, and with a few leading questions you can read them like they were children's books. It’s a useful talent, and one that you’re perfectly willing to use for your advantage. You know what people want and you promise to deliver, coaxing people into otherwise foolish decisions. You make the improbable sound plausible, and come ahead on every deal.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Performance, and Sleight of Hand
equipmentMarkdown: A set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, a memento of a former con, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
specialityMarkdown: Every scoundrel has an angle they use in preference to other schemes. Choose a favorite scam or roll on the table below.
featureMarkdown: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona.\n\nAdditionally, you can forge documents including official papers and personal letters, as long as you have seen an example of the kind of document or the handwriting you are trying to copy.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Scoundrels are colorful characters who conceal their true selves behind the masks they construct. They reflect what people want to see, what they want to believe, and how they see the world. But their true selves are sometimes plagued by an uneasy conscience, an old enemy, or deep-seated trust issues.

name: Jedi
description:
You are a devout follower of the Jedi Order: an ancient, monastic peacekeeping organization united in its observance of the light side of the Force. A noble order of protectors noted for their ability to tap into the power of the Force, the Jedi serve as guardians of peace and justice in the Galactic Republic. You follow the Jedi Code:

*"There is no emotion, there is peace.*
*There is no ignorance, there is knowledge.*
*There is no passion, there is serenity.*
*There is no chaos, there is harmony.*
*There is no death, there is the Force."*
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Insight, Investigation, Lore, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: A copy of the Jedi code, a set of common clothes including a robe, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
featureMarkdown: As a Jedi, you command the respect of those who are loyal to the Jedi Order. You and your adventuring companions can expect to receive free healing and care at any Jedi temple, and those who support your religion will support you (but only you) at a modest lifestyle.\n\nYou might also have ties to a specific Jedi temple and have a residence there. This could be the temple where you trained, or a temple where you have found a new home. While near your temple, you can call upon the Jedi for assistance, provided the assistance you ask for is not hazardous and you remain in good standing with your temple.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Jedi are shaped by their experience in their temple. Their study of the history and tenets of the Jedi Order and their relationships to temples, shrines, or hierarchies affect their mannerisms and ideals. Their flaws might be some hidden hypocrisy or heretical idea, or an ideal or bond taken to an extreme.

flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"Now that I've returned to the world, I enjoy its delights a little too much."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I harbor dark, bloodthirsty thoughts that my isolation and meditation failed to quell."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I let my need to win arguments overshadow friendships and harmony."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I’d risk too much to uncover a lost bit of knowledge."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I like keeping secrets and won’t share them with anyone."}]}
name: Hermit
description: You lived in seclusion—either in a community or alone—for a formative part of your life. In your time apart from society, you found quiet, solitude, and perhaps some of the answers you were looking for.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Animal Handling, Lore, Medicine, and Nature
equipmentMarkdown: A diary of your experiences, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, an herbalism kit, and 50 cr
specialityMarkdown: What was the reason for your isolation, and what changed to allow you to end your solitude? You can work with your DM to determine the exact nature of your seclusion, or you can choose or roll on the table below to determine the reason behind your seclusion.
featureMarkdown: The seclusion of your hermitage gave you access to a unique and powerful discovery. The nature of this revelation depends on the nature of your seclusion. You might have discoved a great truth about the cosmos or the Force, a fact that has long been forgotten, a relic of the past that could rewrite history, or a place unseen for ages. It might be information that would be damaging to the people who or consigned you to exile, and hence the reason for your return to society. Work with your DM to determine the details of your discovery and its impact on the campaign.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Some hermits are well suited to a life of seclusion, whereas others chafe against it and long for company. Whether they embrace solitude or long to escape it, the solitary life shapes their attitudes and ideals. Some few are driven slightly mad by their isolation.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I know a story relevant to almost every situation."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors and spread gossip."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I’m a hopeless romantic, always searching for that “special someone.”"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount of tension."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I love a good insult, even one directed at me."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I get bitter if I’m not the center of attention."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I’ll settle for nothing less than perfection."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"**Beauty**. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Light)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"**Tradition**. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Creativity**. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"**Greed**. I’m only in it for the money and fame. (Dark)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"**People**. I like seeing the smiles on people’s faces when I perform. That’s all that matters. (Neutral)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Honesty**. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"My instrument is my most treasured possession, and it reminds me of someone I love."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"Someone stole my precious trophy, and someday I’ll get it back."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I want to be famous, whatever it takes."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person’s."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I will do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I’ll do anything to win fame and renown."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I’m a sucker for a pretty face."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I once satirized a noble who still wants my head. It was a mistake that I will likely repeat."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"Despite my best efforts, I am unreliable to my friends."}]}
name: Gladiator
description: A gladiator is as much an entertainer as any minstrel or circus performer, trained to make the arts of combat into a spectacle the crowd can enjoy. This kind of flashy combat is your entertainer routine, though you might also have some skills as a tumbler or actor. Using your A Champion Well Known feature, you can find a place to perform in any place that features combat for entertainment—perhaps a gladiatorial arena or secret pit fighting club.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, and Performance
equipmentMarkdown: A trophy earned via some sort of competition, clothing suitable to your profession, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
featureMarkdown: You can always find a place to perform, usually in an inn or tavern but possibly with a circus, at a theater, or even in a noble’s court. At such a place, you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard (depending on the quality of the establishment), as long as you perform each night. In addition, your performance makes you something of a local figure. When strangers recognize you in a town where you have performed, they typically take a liking to you.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Successful entertainers have to be able to capture and hold an audience’s attention, so they tend to have flamboyant or forceful personalities. They’re inclined toward the romantic and often cling to high-minded ideals about the practice of art and the appreciation of beauty.

name: Outlaw
description: You are a notorious free adventurer who, due to unfortunate circumstances, has lost favor with the law. However, being of the common people, they protect you due to your just nature. A protector of the people, a thorn in the side of authorities.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Acrobatics, Athletics, Insight, and Survival
equipmentMarkdown: A hunting trap, an iron pot, a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 150 cr
specialityMarkdown: Though you were once just a common civilian, a specific happening caused you to drastically change your lifestyle and take off for a life of dangerous wondering and in some cases revenge. Choose or randomly determine a defining event that marked you as an outlaw.
featureMarkdown: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you've shown yourself to be a danger to them. They will shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: An outlaw is a hero for the common people who takes pride in his humble origins and revels in disrupting authority to help those he's close to.

name: Folk Hero
description: You come from a humble social rank, but you are destined for so much more. Already the people of your home village regard you as their champion, and your destiny calls you to stand against the tyrants and monsters that threaten the common folk everywhere.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Animal Handling, Athletics, Nature, and Performance
toolProficiencyMarkdown: One type of artisan’s tools, biochemist's kit, or chef's kit
equipmentMarkdown: A set of tools (one of your choice), a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr
specialityMarkdown: You previously pursued a simple profession among the peasantry, perhaps as a farmer or miner, servant or shepherd. But something happened that set you on a different path and marked you for greater things. Choose or randomly determine a defining event that marked you as a hero of the people.
featureMarkdown: Since you are of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them. They will shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: A folk hero is one of the common people, for better or for worse. Most folk heroes look on their humble origins as a virtue, not a shortcoming, and their home communities remain very important to them.

I’m okay with that."}]}
name: Crime Lord
description: Few societies manage to eradicate crime altogether. In the underworld, someone always rises to the top, either through vision, organisation, or sheer intimidation. The life of a crime lord isn't for the timid. After conquering an unseen empire, the crime lord wages a daily struggle not only to stay on top, but also to stay alive.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Intimidation, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: A fine set of clothes, a gaming set (one of your choice), and a purse containing 250 cr
specialityMarkdown: Of course, not every crime lord is bent on corrupting society and making a profit. Some use their criminal connections to wage guerilla wars against tyrants and despots. Indeed, some of the lesser-known heroes of the Rebellion began as smugglers or pirates, and eventually rose through the ranks of their organisation to provide a more noble direction for their groups' activities. Although some did so to remove an obstacle to making more money, others recognised that ridding the galaxy of the Empire's evil was a more important long-term goal. Choose the motivation behind your criminal enterprise, or roll on the table below.
featureMarkdown: You have access to an extensive network of organised crime. You know how to get messages to and from local contacts, even over great distances; specifically, you know the local messengers, corrupt caravan masters, and seedy sailors who can deliver messages for you.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Crime lords might seem like villains on the surface, and many of them are villainous to the core. But some have an abundance of endearing, if not redeeming, characteristics. Unlike common thieves, some crime lords even have some respect for law and authority, with whom they play a cat-and-mouse type game.

name: Noble
description:
You understand wealth, power, and privilege. You carry a noble title, and your family owns land, collects taxes, and wields significant political influence. You might be a pampered aristocrat unfamiliar with manual labor, a former merchant just elevated to the nobility, or an honest, hard-working landowner who cares deeply about the people who live and work on your land.

Work with your DM to come up with an appropriate title and determine how much authority that title carries, as well as your family and their influence on you. Is your family old and established, or was your title only recently bestowed? How much influence do they wield, how do people regard them?

What’s your position in the family? Are you the heir to the head of the family or the head itself? Are you far down the line of succession? How does the head of your family feel about your adventuring career? Are you in your family’s good graces, or shunned by the rest of your family?

Does your family have a coat of arms you might wear, a signet ring, or particular colors? 

These details help establish your family and your title as features of the world of the campaign.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Lore, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a letter of pedigree, and a purse containing 250 cr
featureMarkdown: Thanks to your noble birth, people are inclined to think the best of you. You are welcome in high society, and people assume you have the right to be wherever you are. The common folk make every effort to accommodate you and avoid your displeasure, and other people of high birth treat you as a member of the same social sphere. You can secure an audience with a local noble if you need to.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Nobles are born and raised to a very different lifestyle than most people ever experience, and their personalities reflect that upbringing. A noble title comes with a plethora of bonds—responsibilities to family, to other nobles (including the sovereign), to the people entrusted to the family’s care, or even to the title itself. But this responsibility is often a good way to undermine a noble.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I can't bring myself to ignore a cry for help."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I hold onto every mildly interesting item I find, in case it comes in handy someday."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"After all the weirdness I've seen on my travels, nothing can surprise me."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I spit and laugh in the face of danger."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"Giving up is never an option for me."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I feel more at home in monster-infested dungeons than in civilized society."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I fill silence with wacky stories about my past misadventures, which may or may not be exaggerated."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"My sense of humor is as dark and grim as the dungeons I explore."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":" **Adventure.** All I want is to travel the world and see amazing things. (Any)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":" **Heroism.** I am dedicated to helping people in need. (Light)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":" **Order.** I use my power to save the world from the forces of destruction and chaos. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":" **Excitement.** An ordinary life is boring, I'd rather travel around and find trouble. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":" **Power.** The more powerful enemies I defeat, the stronger I become. (Neutral)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":" **Aspiration.** I want to go down in history as a brave, powerful hero. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":" I carry with me a strange artifact that I found in a dungeon, but I don't know what it's for."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":" My adventuring party means the world to me."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":" I have sworn to hunt down the monster or villain who killed my former adventuring party."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":" I adventure in order to bring honor (or money) to my family."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":" There is a faraway place I've always wanted to visit, and I won't stop until I make it there."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":" All I want is to make the ones who trained me in the way of adventuring proud."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":" I default to solving problems with violence even when it's unwise or immoral."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":" I expect to be lavished with praise whenever I do my job, and I get mad when no one acknowledges me."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":" All members of \"Dark\" species must be Dark, so I will never trust them."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":" Waiting around makes me antsy. I'd rather do something stupid than do nothing at all."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":" My habit of looting dungeons makes me swipe things I shouldn't."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":" A monstrous enemy I faced in the past still leaves me quivering with fear."}]}
name: Guild Adventurer
description: Adventuring is nothing new to you. Due to the circumstances of how you were raised, you have been involved with wandering heroes for most of your life. Maybe you were part of an adventuring band previously, but split with them after a disagreement or tragedy. Or, perhaps you worked around heroes in a lesser role for most of your young life, and you are now ready to graduate to the front lines.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Athletics, Investigation, Nature, and Survival
toolProficiencyMarkdown: Your choice demolitions kit, security kit, or slicer's kit
equipmentMarkdown: 50 feet of rope, a small knife, a trophy, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr.
featureMarkdown: You are an established and respected member of an adventurer's guild, allowing you to rely on certain benefits that membership provides. If you are in a town with a headquarters for your adventurer's guild and you are in good standing with the guild, you will be allowed to look at the job postings and find adventuring work to earn money. \n\nGuilds often wield tremendous political power. If you are accused of a crime, your guild will support you if a good case can be made for your innocence or the crime is justifiable. You can also gain access to powerful political figures through the guild, if you are a member in good standing. You must pay dues of 50 cr per month to the guild. Your dues must be current to remain in the guild’s good graces.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Adventurers are well adjusted to life on the road. They are often comfortable doing dangerous things like dungeoneering and fighting and can stay level-headed in the face of danger, but they may not be so well adapted to other parts of life.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"My crewmates know they can rely on me, no matter what."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I work hard so that I can play hard when the work is done."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I enjoy traveling into new systems and making new friends over a drink."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I stretch the truth for the sake of a good story."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"To me, a bar brawl is a nice way to get to know a new city."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I never pass up a friendly wager."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can’t do it."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I like a job well done, especially if I can convince someone else to do it."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"**Respect**. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Light)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"**Fairness**. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Freedom**. Space is freedom — the freedom to go anywhere and do anything. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"**Mastery**. I'm a predator, and the other ships we come across are my prey. (Dark)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"**People**. I'm committed to my crewmates, not to ideals. (Neutral)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Aspiration**. Someday, I'll own my own ship and chart my own destiny. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I'm loyal to my captain first, everything else second."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"The ship is most important—crewmates and captains come and go."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I'll always remember my first ship."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I will become the greatest captain that ever lived."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I was cheated out of my fair share of the profits, and I want to get my due."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"Ruthless space pirates murdered my captain and crewmates, stole all we owned, and left me lo die. Vengeance will be mine."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"\tI follow orders, even if I think they're wrong."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"\tI'll say anything to avoid having to do extra work."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"Once someone questions my courage, I never back down no matter how dangerous the situation."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"\tOnce I start drinking, it's hard for me to stop."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"\tI can't help but pocket loose coins and other trinkets I come across."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"My pride will probably lead to my destruction."}]}
name: Spacer
description: Aboard a star ship in the cold vacuum of space is where you feel most at home. You've spent the majority of your life travelling the stars. Life aboard ships has given you a good understanding of their inner workings. You might be especially skilled as a ship mechanic, a pilot, or support staff.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Insight, Investigation, Piloting, and Technology
toolProficiencyMarkdown: Your choice of chef's kit, mechanic's kit, or one type of gaming set
equipmentMarkdown: A set of tools or a gaming set (one of your choice), a set of common clothes, a small souvenir from your travels, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr
specialityMarkdown: During your time as a spacer, you had a specific role to play aboard the ship. Roll a d8 or choose from the options in the table below to determine your role:
featureMarkdown: As a spacer, you've been from one end of the galaxy to the other. You've traveled along many of the trade routes, and know the safest routes. You have expert knowledge of the various hyperlanes. In addition to this, you know a large number of the models and designs of common space ships that are found in the galaxy.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Spacers come from all walks of life, and the responsibilities of life aboard a ship make them generally reliable as well. Spending so much time on their ship shapes their outlook and forms their most important attachments.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I know a story relevant to almost every situation."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors and spread gossip."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I’m a hopeless romantic, always searching for that “special someone.”"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount of tension."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I love a good insult, even one directed at me."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I get bitter if I’m not the center of attention."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I’ll settle for nothing less than perfection."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"**Beauty**. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Light)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"**Tradition**. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Creativity**. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"**Greed**. I’m only in it for the money and fame. (Dark)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"**People**. I like seeing the smiles on people’s faces when I perform. That’s all that matters. (Neutral)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Honesty**. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"My instrument is my most treasured possession, and it reminds me of someone I love."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"Someone stole my precious instrument, and someday I’ll get it back."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I want to be famous, whatever it takes."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person’s."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I will do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I’ll do anything to win fame and renown."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I’m a sucker for a pretty face."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I once satirized a noble who still wants my head. It was a mistake that I will likely repeat."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"Despite my best efforts, I am unreliable to my friends."}]}
name: Entertainer
description: You thrive in front of an audience, knowing how to entrance them, entertain them, and even inspire them. Your poetics can stir the hearts of those who hear you, awakening grief or joy, laughter or anger. Your music raises their spirits or captures their sorrow. Your dance steps captivate, your humor cuts to the quick. Whatever techniques you use, your art is your life.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Acrobatics, Insight, Performance, and Sleight of Hand
toolProficiencyMarkdown: Disguise kit, one type of musical instrument
equipmentMarkdown: A musical instrument (one of your choice), the favor of an admirer (love letter, lock of hair, or trinket), a costume, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
specialityMarkdown: A good entertainer is versatile, spicing up every performance with a variety of different routines. Choose one to three routines or roll on the table below to define your expertise as an entertainer.
featureMarkdown: You can always find a place to perform, usually in an inn or cantina but possibly with a circus, at a theater, or even in a noble’s court. At such a place, you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard (depending on the quality of the establishment), as long as you perform each night. In addition, your performance makes you something of a local figure. When strangers recognize you in a town where you have performed, they typically take a liking to you.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Successful entertainers have to be able to capture and hold an audience’s attention, so they tend to have flamboyant or forceful personalities. They’re inclined toward the romantic and often cling to high-minded ideals about the practice of art and the appreciation of beauty.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I am extremely sociable, especially over a mug of ale."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I always keep my wares close to me, you never know who might stumble across them otherwise."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"The best way to hide is out in the open."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I'm a terrible gossip."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"Being seen with any unsavory figures is a sure way to undermine my work, which is why I work out of sight."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"Deflecting questions has become second nature to me, so I rarely answer straight."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I have dozens of identities and live in constant fear of answering to the wrong name."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I act irrationally confident in the face of danger, nobody suspects anything when you seem like you're in charge."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"**Morals.** I only smuggle things to improve the lives of the common folk. (Light)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"**Ruthless.** I will rise to the top of the heap by any means necessary. (Dark)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Friendship.** My associates are dear to me, and I want them to rise with me when I hit it big. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"**Dauntless.** No border crossing or bribe is too difficult- that's just the coward's way of saying exciting! (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"**Greater.** Good I work for a greater cause, and ply my trade only in service to it. (Any)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Unperturbed.** I only want to make a living for myself, and smuggling is just an edge I can use to do so. (Neutral)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"A corrupt official shut me down back in my honest days. I aim to show him a thing or two about recovery."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I never wanted to be a criminal, but it pays the bills."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"A bloodthirsty pirate stole a shipment from me and killed a dear friend of mine. I will have my vengeance."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"Someone I cared about discovered my profession and has publicly denounced me, and I am caught between protecting my reputation and restoring our relationship."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"My love interest is someone who once stole from right under my nose- but they have no idea who I am or how much I admire them for their accomplishment."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"My business partners are closer to me than my family."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"\"Trust nobody, not even yourself.\" I am plagued by paranoia."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I'm so charismatic that sometimes I woo myself. Who am I, Narcissus?"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"Money is my greatest motivator. I'll do almost anything given enough of it, even if I'll regret it later."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I would betray anyone to save my own skin."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I detach myself from the results of my actions in order to sleep better at night."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"Someone who knows me well might call me \"two-faced\" but those who don't have no idea what hit 'em."}]}
name: Smuggler
description: You have spent your life hiding in the darkness, making shady deals behind closed doors. What led you to engage in a life of crime? Do you crave the thrill of lawbreaking, or did you enter the profession to pay off a debt, risking your hide on behalf of a less than honorable noble? A smuggler is an individual trained in the art of acquisition, a professional thug who can deliver anything... for a price. Smugglers tend to be more bolder criminals than most, preferring bribery or distraction over subterfuge and stealth.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Piloting, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth
toolProficiencyMarkdown: One type of gaming set and your choice of demolitions kit, security kit, or slicer's kit
equipmentMarkdown: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
featureMarkdown: Some close brushes with the law have taught you that not every city guard can be bribed, and some people are simply too keen to miss minute discrepancies. This feature allows you to study a person and gain insight into whether or not they would accept a bribe, or to pick up on whether they are exceptionally more perceptive than you. It does not reveal how expensive a bribe may be for a given situation, however.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Smugglers might seem like villains on the surface, and many of them are nefarious to the core. But some have an abundance of endearing, if not redeeming, characteristics. There might be honor among thieves, but spies rarely show any respect for law or authority.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I idolize a particular hero of my faction, and constantly refer to that person’s deeds and example."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working towards peace."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I see omens in every event and action."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I quote (or misquote) sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I am tolerant (or intolerant) of other factions and respect (or condemn) them."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my faction’s elite. Rough living grates on me."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I have little practical experience dealing with people in the  world."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"**Tradition**. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"**Charity**. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Light)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Change**. We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"**Power**. I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith’s religious hierarchy. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"**Faith**. I trust that my leader will guide my actions, I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Aspiration**. I seek to prove myself worthy of my leader’s favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I would die to recover an artifact of my faction that was lost long ago."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I will someday get revenge on the corrupt faction hierarchy who branded me a heretic."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I owe my life to the faction member who took me in when my parents died."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"Everything I do is for the common people."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I will do anything to protect the faction where I served."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies consider heretical and seek to destroy."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I put too much trust in those who wield power within my faction’s hierarchy."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my faction."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I am inflexible in my thinking."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life."}]}
name: Agent
description: Many organizations active in the galaxy aren't bound by strictures of geography. These factions pursue their agendas without regard for political boundaries, and their members operate anywhere the organization deems necessary. These groups employ listeners, rumormongers, smugglers, mercenaries, cache-holders (people who guard caches of wealth or items for use by the faction's operatives), haven keepers, and message drop minders, to name a few. At the core of every faction are those who don't merely fulfill a small function for that organization, but who serve as its hands, head, and heart. As a prelude to your adventuring career (and in preparation for it), you served as an agent of a particular faction. You might have operated openly or secretly, depending on the faction and its goals, as well as how those goals mesh with your own. Becoming an adventurer doesn't necessarily require you to relinquish membership in your faction (though you can choose to do so), and it might enhance your status in the faction.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Investigation, Lore, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: Badge or emblem of your faction, a copy of a seminal faction text (or a code-book for a covert faction), a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 150 cr
featureMarkdown: As a faction agent, you have access to a secret network of supporters and operatives who can provide assistance on your adventures. You know a set of secret signs and passwords you can use to identify such operatives, who can provide you with access to a hidden safe house, free room and board, or assistance in finding information. These agents never risk their lives for you or risk revealing their true identities.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Agents are shaped by their experience in their faction’s communities. Their study of the history and tenets of their faction and their relationships to it affect their mannerisms and ideals. Their flaws might be some hidden hypocrisy or heretical idea, or an ideal or bond taken to an extreme.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I've read every book in the world’s greatest libraries—or I like to boast that I have."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I'm used to helping out those who aren’t as smart as I am, and I patiently explain anything and everything to others."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"There’s nothing I like more than a good mystery."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I’m willing to listen to every side of an argument before I make my own judgment."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I... speak... slowly... when talking... to idiots,... which... almost... everyone... is... compared... to me."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I am horribly, horribly awkward in social situations."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I’m convinced that people are always trying to steal my secrets."}]}
ideals: {"diceType":6,"name":"Ideal","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"**Knowledge**. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)"},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"**Beauty**. What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true. (Light)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Logic**. Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking. (Lawful)"},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"**No Limits**. Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"**Power**. Knowledge is the path to power and domination. (Dark)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Self-Improvement**. The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"It is my duty to protect my students."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I have an ancient text that holds terrible secrets that must not fall into the wrong hands."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I work to preserve a library, university, scriptorium, or monastery."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"My life’s work is a series of tomes related to a specific field of lore."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I sold my soul for knowledge. I hope to do great deeds and win it back."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I am easily distracted by the promise of information."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"Most people scream and run when they see a monster. I stop and take notes on its anatomy."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"Unlocking an ancient mystery is worth the price of a civilization."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I speak without really thinking through my words, invariably insulting others."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I can’t keep a secret to save my life, or anyone else’s."}]}
name: Student
description: As a child, you were inquisitive when your playmates were possessive or raucous. In your formative years, you found your way to one of the galaxy's great institutes of learning, where you were apprenticed and taught that knowledge is a more valuable treasure than gold or gems. Now you are ready to leave your home- not to abandon it, but to quest for new lore to add to its storehouse of knowledge.\n\nThe most well-known of the galaxy's fonts of knowledge is the Library of the Republic. The great library is always in need of workers and attendants, some of whom rise through the ranks to assume roles of greater responsibility and prominence. You might be one of Coruscant's own, dedicated to the curatorship of what is likely the most complete body of lore and history in all the world.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Insight, Lore, Investigation, and Nature
equipmentMarkdown: The scholar's robes of your cloister, a writing kit (small pouch with a quill, ink, folded parchment, and a small penknife), a borrowed book on the subject of your current study, and a pouch containing 100 cr
featureMarkdown:
Though others must often endure extensive interviews and significant fees to gain access to even the most common archives in your library, you have free and easy access to the majority of the library, though it might also have repositories of lore that are too valuable, powerful, or secret to permit anyone immediate access.

You have a working knowledge of your cloister's personnel and bureaucracy, and you know how to navigate those connections with some ease.

Additionally, you are likely to gain preferential treatment at other libraries across the galaxy, as professional courtesy shown to a fellow scholar.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Cloistered scholars are defined by their extensive studies, and their characteristics reflect this life of study. Devoted to scholarly pursuits, they value knowledge highly – as a worthy goal in itself, or as a means to a desirable end.

name: Mandalorian
description: You are a child of Mandalore. As a member of the most renowned warrior culture in history, your people are known for being strong and hardy. Mandalorian culture is built around the honor and glory that come from victory in battle.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Athletics, Intimidation, Piloting, and Survival
languageMarkdown: Mando'a and one of your choice
equipmentMarkdown: A set of traveler's clothes, a trophy from a previous victory, and a pouch containing 200 cr
specialityMarkdown: Mandalorian culture is built on the backbone of various clans. The clan you are a part of has it's own history, allegiances, and fueds which shape your persepctive. Choose an option or roll on the table below to determine your clan.
featureMarkdown: Other Mandalorians know, and will look out for you. If you're ever in need of a place to stay, or a meal to eat, other Mandalorians  will help you as long as your clans aren't feuding. This could be in the form of shelters, meals, even healing. If the Mandalorians are of your clan or a clan friendly to you, they may be willing to help you even at cost to themselves.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Mandalorians are a meritocracy where birthplace, rank, status, and citizenship mean nothing. You are what you do. Mandalorians live by the Resol'nare (the "Six Actions"). As a true Mandalorian you should strive to live by this code as much as possible by remaining honorable. Your flaw(s) might consist of any dishonor you've committed, or even being too honorable.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I like to impress everyone I meet with a simple trick or a quick joke."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I constantly make side bets on everything that happens around me."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"No matter how high the stakes, I always appear calm."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I try to be unpredictable, so no one will know when I'm bluffing."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I never back down from a challenge."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I can't get satisfaction out of something if the stakes are too low."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I tend to make friends out of enemies, and enemies out of friends."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I prefer one game above all others."}]}

Mine happens to be pretty low."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I assume everyone is hiding something from me."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I tend to value money more than people."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I like to think I could drink anyone under the table, but I'm really a lightweight."}]}
name: Gambler
description: You are a skilled gambler who spends most of your time in casinos, bar rooms, and gambling dens. Are your activities legal, or do you break the law? Have you ever cheated in a game, or do you play by the rules? No matter what, your life has been one of excitement, chance, and danger.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Intimidation, and Sleight of Hand
equipmentMarkdown: A set of common clothes, a set of dice, a deck of playing cards, a lucky charm, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr.
featureMarkdown: You can convince nearly anyone to put up something they aren't normally willing to part with (property or information) in a game of chance. Your DM might rule that they will only agree to a game of their choosing, and they may only agree if they feel the odds are in their favor.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Gambling is your passion, for better or for worse. Most gamblers see their vices as virtues, and overlook things in their pursuit of the rush.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I am compulsively neat, and clean; I feel uncomfortable if my companions and I are ever dirty or  unpresentable."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I am a bit of a snob, and look down on the common rabble."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I am extremely subservient; I rarely raise my voice or object."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I may be quite calm and polite around those of higher power than I; but I'm harsh towards all my underlings, flexing the little power I have."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I dote over my companions like a concerned mother bird, fixing their clothing and making sure they look nice."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I hated my time as a servant, and go out of my way to enjoy myself and let loose, rarely holding my tongue."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I rarely show any emotions, remaining calm and stoic even in the worst of situations."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I can-or think I can-diffuse the most tense and stressful of situations with the right word or phrase."}]}

(Neutral)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Live.** I only wish to serve in peace. (Any)"}]}
bonds: {"diceType":6,"name":"Bond","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I am still loyal to my old master."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"The Lord I worked for is after my head, and will do anything to capture me."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"My family still live as servants; I hope to earn a better life for them."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"An older servant taught me the ropes and looked out for me; and I owe them a great debt."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I will exact revenge on the bastards who ruined (or ended) my Master's life."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I have plenty of friends in high places; and they've come in useful from time to time."}]}
flaws: {"diceType":6,"name":"Flaw","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I become incredibly nervous around people of power and importance."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"Saying that I'm a little bossy is a bit of an understatement."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I can be a sycophant, constantly fawning and flattering others; which can come off as shallow."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I've lived a relatively pampered life; the world of commoners is dull and painful to me."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I never speak for myself, letting others walk all over me."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I often can seem stiff, old fashioned and generally a stick in the mud."}]}
name: Servant
description: You have lived much of your life in the service of a lord, noble, merchant, or someone else with much wealth or power. You fetched their coats, drove their chariots, pressed their clothes; and generally did what they asked you to do.\n\nWere you a highly respected butler? A simple scullery maid? Were you born into service, or did you join later? Were you close to your master or masters, or were they distant and cold? Did they treat you well, or beat you at the drop of a hat?
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Insight, Lore, Performance, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: A noble symbol representing your employer, a set of artisan's tools (one of your choice), a set of nice clothes, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 100 cr
featureMarkdown: You know how to carry yourself around the elite and their servants. When in the presence of someone of power, or the servants of such a person, you can easily act as if you belong and, barring any extremely outlandish behavior, you can pass off your companions as belonging, too.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: A servant, for better or worse, will have their personality affected by their years of servitude.

name: Sith
description:
You are an acolyte of the Sith Order: an ancient order of Force-wielders devoted to the dark side of the Force. Emerging as a divergent faction to the Jedi Order, the Sith are mortal enemies of the Jedi and fight against them. Driven by emotions such as hate, anger, and greed, the Sith are deceptive and ultimately obsessed with amassing power no matter the cost. You follow the Sith Code:

*"Peace is a lie. There is only passion.*
*Through passion I gain strength.*
*Through strength I gain power.*
*Through power I gain victory.*
*Through victory my chains are broken.*
*The Force shall free me."*
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Intimidation, and Lore
equipmentMarkdown: A copy of the Sith code, a set of common clothes including a robe, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
featureMarkdown: As a Sith, you instill fear in those who are aware of your standing. You and your adventuring companions can expect to receive free healing and care at any Sith temple, and those who are aware of your nature will support you (but only you) at a modest lifestyle.\n\nYou might also have ties to a specific Sith temple and have a residence there. This could be the temple where you trained, or a temple where you have found a new home. While near your temple, you can call upon the Sith for assistance, provided the assistance you ask for benefits them and you remain in good standing with your temple.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Sith are shaped by their training. They study the Sith code and use it to oppress the weak and quell resistance. Their study of the Sith code affects their mannerisms and ideals. Their flaws might be some hidden hypocrisy or heretical idea, or an ideal or bond taken to an extreme.

I’m okay with that."}]}
name: Bounty Hunter
description: Before you became an adventurer, your life was already full of conflict and excitement, because you made a living tracking down people for pay. Unlike some people who collect bounties, though, you aren't a savage who follows quarry into or through the wilderness. You’re involved in a lucrative trade, in the place where you live, that routinely tests your skills and survival instincts. What's more, you aren't alone, as a bounty hunter in the wild would be: you routinely interact with both the criminal subculture and other bounty hunters, maintaining contacts in both areas to help you succeed.\n\nYou might be a cunning thief-catcher, prowling the rooftops to catch one of the myriad burglars of the city. Perhaps you are someone who has your ear to the street, aware of the doings of street gangs. You might be a "velvet mask" bounty hunter, one who blends in with high society and noble circles in order to catch the criminals that prey on the rich, whether pickpockets or con artists. As a member of an adventuring party, you might find it more difficult to pursue a personal agenda that doesn't fit with the group's objectives - but on the other hand, you can take down much more formidable targets with the help of your companions.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Persuasion, and Stealth
toolProficiencyMarkdown: Your choice of demolitions kit, security kit, or slicer's kit
equipmentMarkdown: A set of clothes appropriate to your duties, a set of binders, and a pouch containing 200 cr
featureMarkdown: You are in frequent contact with people in the segment of society that your chosen quarries move through. These people might be associated with the criminal underworld, the rough-and-tumble folk of the streets, or members of high society. This connection comes in the form of a contact in any city you visit, a person who provides information about the people and places of the local area.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Your bond might involve other bounty hunters or the organizations or individuals that employ you. Your ideal could be associated with your determination always to catch your quarry or your desire to maintain your reputation for being dependable.

personalityTraits: {"diceType":8,"name":"Personality Trait","values":[{"minValue":1,"maxValue":1,"result":"I believe that anything worth doing is worth doing right. I can’t help it— I’m a perfectionist."},{"minValue":2,"maxValue":2,"result":"I’m a snob who looks down on those who can’t appreciate fine art."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"I always want to know how things work and what makes people tick."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I’m full of witty aphorisms and have a proverb for every occasion."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I’m rude to people who lack my commitment to hard work and fair play."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"I like to talk at length about my profession."},{"minValue":7,"maxValue":7,"result":"I don’t part with my money easily and will haggle tirelessly to get the best deal possible."},{"minValue":8,"maxValue":8,"result":"I believe I’m well known for my work, and I'm always taken aback when people haven’t heard of me."}]}

(Neutral)"},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"**Aspiration.** I work hard to be the best there is at my craft. (Any)"}]}

Everywhere I go, I’m surrounded by rivals."}]}
name: Guild Merchant
description: Instead of an artisans’ guild, you might belong to a guild of traders, caravan masters, or shopkeepers. You don’t craft items yourself but earn a living by buying and selling the works of others. Your guild might be a large merchant consortium (or family) with interests across the galaxy. Perhaps you transported goods from one place to another, by ship, wagon, or caravan, or bought them from traveling traders and sold them in your own little shop. In some ways, the traveling merchant’s life lends itself to adventure far more than the life of an artisan.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Insight, Performance, and Persuasion
equipmentMarkdown: A letter of introduction from your guild, a set of traveler’s clothes, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
featureMarkdown: As an established and respected member of a guild, you can rely on certain benefits that membership provides. Your fellow guild members will provide you with lodging and food if necessary, and pay for your funeral if needed. In some cities and towns, a guildhall offers a central place to meet other members of your profession, which can be a good place to meet potential patrons, allies, or hirelings.\n\nGuilds often wield tremendous political power. If you are accused of a crime, your guild will support you if a good case can be made for your innocence or the crime is justifiable. You can also gain access to powerful political figures through the guild, if you are a member in good standing. You must pay dues of 50 cr per month to the guild. Your dues must be current to remain in the guild’s good graces.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Guild merchants are among the most ordinary people in the world—until they abscond to take up an adventuring career. They understand the value of hard work and the importance of community, but they’re vulnerable to sins of greed and covetousness.

I never raise my voice or let me emotions control me."},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"The first thing I do in a new place is note the locations of everything valuable – or where such things could be hidden."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I am incredibly slow to trust. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)"},{"minValue":3,"maxValue":3,"result":"**Charity**. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. If I don’t forget it, I’ll ignore it."},{"minValue":4,"maxValue":4,"result":"I have a “tell” that reveals when I'm lying."},{"minValue":5,"maxValue":5,"result":"I turn tail and run when things look bad."},{"minValue":6,"maxValue":6,"result":"An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I’m okay with that."}]}
name: Criminal
description: You are an experienced criminal with a history of breaking the law. You have spent a lot of time among other criminals and still have contacts within the criminal underworld. You’re far closer than most people to the world of murder, theft, and violence that pervades the underbelly of civilization, and you have survived up to this point by flouting the rules and regulations of society.
proficiencyMarkdown: Choose two from among Deception, Intimidation, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth
toolProficiencyMarkdown: One type of gaming set, your choice of demolitions kit, security kit, or slicer's kit
equipmentMarkdown: A set of common clothes with a hood, a gaming set (one of your choice), and a belt pouch containing 150 cr
specialityMarkdown: Individual criminals often have particular specialties, whether a part of an organization or a solo endeavor. Choose the role you played in your criminal life, or roll on the table below.
featureMarkdown: You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals. You know how to get messages to and from your contact, even over great distances; specifically, you know the local messengers, corrupt caravan masters, and seedy sailors who can deliver messages for you.
backgroundFeatMarkdown: As a further embodiment of the experience and training of your background, you can choose from the following feats:
suggestedCharacteristicsMarkdown: Criminals might seem like villains on the surface, and many of them are villainous to the core. But some have an abundance of endearing, if not redeeming, characteristics. There might be honor among thieves, but criminals rarely show any respect for law or authority.
